name: DaisyX - Telegram Userbot with Assistant
description: A modular Telegram Userbot with Assistant running on Python 3.6+

ENV.description: Fill this if you using environ variable as config.

TOKEN.description: Go to some bot, and check your id there. Ex. @EmiliaHikariBot or @MissRose_bot.

STRING_SESSION.description: (optional) Fill your Bitly API, register here: https://dev.bitly.com/my_apps.html
